## 6.0.2 (2023-12-28)

### Bug fixes

Tag comments and strings as isolating for the purpose of bidirectional text.

## 6.0.1 (2022-10-24)

### Bug fixes

Make sure the language object has a name.

### Breaking changes

Update dependencies to 6.0.0
